name: Flying Cloud
text: As long as this card is not bestowed to a card and your J-ruler is wind, it gains [+200/+200] and Flying. As long as bestowed resonator is wind, it gains [+200/+200] and Flying. Bestow , (Bestow this card to target resonator. Play this ability only if this card is not bestowed to a card and only anytime you can play a chant.)
